answers.answer: Worth a trip to the vet to see if he has a UTI or kidney stones.  Then again my dachshunds didn't see the point in going outside in the snow when it was nice and warm in the house.  :-)  Wouldn't hurt to get a urinalysis - my female dachshund has developed kidney stones and my recently-departed male dachshund had UTIs caused by diabetes.  Check it out.
I agree with utah.  This change in behavior warrants an investigation with your vet.  Same thing started happening with my dog and now she's dying of kidney failure.  Get it check out!

question: I have a two year old minature poodle which was quickly trained as a puppy to go outside to his kennel and relieve himself. Last month he has started urinating only just inside the house from his door to the kennel. He does this at night and not during the day. There are no changes at the house, other than it has been cold outside [for California]. It is not every night.
title: Night Urination in House
